channel.title: (pi) how 2 add ivoted with timer 24 hours only (pi)
channel.description:
**************Files editied in this tut**************** *commands.java player.java * **********************************************
***********************EDIT*********************** *this was codded from scratch for friend so thought id release :) * ************************************************* ok 1st of all u must go 2 server files and search commands.java
now under any command you want
add this
[code]if (playerCommand.equals("ivoted")) { c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); c.sendMessage("Thanks for voting, enjoy your 10M"); } else { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastCommand > 86400000) { //If the lastCommand timer is greater than 30,000 milliseconds (30 Seconds) c.lastCommand = System.currentTimeMillis(); //Resets the lastCommand timer c.sendMessage("You may use this command once every 30 seconds."); //Sends a message
} else { //If the lastCommand timer is not greater than 864000000 Milliseconds c.sendMessage("Sorry, But you must wait 24 hours before using this command again!");//Sends a message } }[/code]
now do not compile yet now u must go 2 player.java and search for
[code]public long lastPlayerMove[/code]
now go 2 end of that line u will see
[code], foodDelay, potDelay;[/codee]
now u can change 2 this
[code], foodDelay, potDelay, lastCommand;[/code]
or this
[code], foodDelay, lastCommand, potDelay;[/code]
now compile and restart server and u get :O working :) if u get errores or need help add me on msn tarb@live.co.uk

item.title: (pi) how 2 add ivoted with timer 24 hours only (pi)
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:311: cannot find symbol symbol : variable lastCommand location: class server.model.players.Client if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastCommand > 86400000) { / /If the lastCommand timer is greater than 30,000 milliseconds (30 Seconds) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:312: cannot find symbol symbol : variable lastCommand location: class server.model.players.Client c.lastCommand = System.currentTimeMillis (); //Resets the lastCommand timer ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: (pi) how 2 add ivoted with timer 24 hours only (pi)
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:14, topic:407396”]Kind of the same as adding a tradeTimer to make players wait a certain amount of time before trading [class PlayerSave].
Or you could add a separate folder named “VoteNames” or something and add a normal .txt file in it and make it [like your IP banning/muting system] that saves their IP in it, after 24 [or however many you want] hours it automatically removes the IP from the file.[/quote]
Good thinking bro, thanks I’m gonna work on it, and prob release soon.

Read full topic
item.source: (pi) how 2 add ivoted with timer 24 hours only (pi)

item.title: (pi) how 2 add ivoted with timer 24 hours only (pi)
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Kind of the same as adding a tradeTimer to make players wait a certain amount of time before trading [class PlayerSave].
Or you could add a separate folder named “VoteNames” or something and add a normal .txt file in it and make it [like your IP banning/muting system] that saves their IP in it, after 24 [or however many you want] hours it automatically removes the IP from the file.

Read full topic
item.source: (pi) how 2 add ivoted with timer 24 hours only (pi)

item.title: (pi) how 2 add ivoted with timer 24 hours only (pi)
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:12, topic:407396”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=508680.msg3690562#msg3690562 date=1312090462]

I’m acctualty working on a turtorial for this… will release this part tough:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("freecash")) {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.freecashDelay < 3600000) {
c.sendMessage("You can only use this command every 1 hour.");
return;
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.freecashDelay >= 3600000) {
c.sendMessage("You recieve 1.000.000 gp.");
c.getItems().addItem(995, 1000000);
c.freecashDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
}

This is an example, don’t use this as your own turtorial.

EDIT: declare freecashDelay inside player.javab

This is much better.

if (playerCommand.equals("ivoted")) { //updated by Imsuperman05 using moh's code :x wow basically the same as his rofl if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastCommand < 86400000) { //This checks if they have waited, looks like they did not. c.sendMessage("You may use this command once every 24 hours."); //Why did you send a message for 30 seconds? return; } else { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastCommand >= 86400000) { //Checks if they have waited 8640000 milliseconds c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); c.lastCommand = System.currentTimeMillis(); //Reset the lastCommand timer AFTER they get the money. c.sendMessage("Thanks for voting, enjoy your 10M"); } } }
[/quote]
We could just use it again when the player logs out.[/quote]
Ye ik i found out last night after some noob did it like 10 times -.- How would i make it save?

Read full topic
item.source: (pi) how 2 add ivoted with timer 24 hours only (pi)

item.title: (pi) how 2 add ivoted with timer 24 hours only (pi)
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:6, topic:407396”][quote author=moh link=topic=508680.msg3690542#msg3690542 date=1312089142]
I’m acctualty working on a turtorial for this… will release this part tough:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("freecash")) {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.freecashDelay < 3600000) {
c.sendMessage("You can only use this command every 1 hour.");
return;
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.freecashDelay >= 3600000) {
c.sendMessage("You recieve 1.000.000 gp.");
c.getItems().addItem(995, 1000000);
c.freecashDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
}

This is an example, don’t use this as your own turtorial.

EDIT: declare freecashDelay inside player.javab
[/quote]
This is much better.

if (playerCommand.equals("ivoted")) { //updated by Imsuperman05 using moh's code :x wow basically the same as his rofl if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastCommand < 86400000) { //This checks if they have waited, looks like they did not. c.sendMessage("You may use this command once every 24 hours."); //Why did you send a message for 30 seconds? return; } else { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastCommand >= 86400000) { //Checks if they have waited 8640000 milliseconds c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); c.lastCommand = System.currentTimeMillis(); //Reset the lastCommand timer AFTER they get the money. c.sendMessage("Thanks for voting, enjoy your 10M"); } } }[/quote]
We could just use it again when the player logs out.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @run_moneygod run moneygod
item.description:
@run_moneygod wrote:

Files editied in this tut**
*commands.java player.java *

EDIT
*this was codded from scratch for friend so thought id release *

ok 1st of all u must go 2 server files and search commands.java

now under any command you want

add this

[code]if (playerCommand.equals(“ivoted”)) {
c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000);
c.sendMessage(“Thanks for voting, enjoy your 10M”);
} else {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastCommand > 86400000) { //If the lastCommand timer is greater than 30,000 milliseconds (30 Seconds)
c.lastCommand = System.currentTimeMillis(); //Resets the lastCommand timer
c.sendMessage(“You may use this command once every 30 seconds.”); //Sends a message

                                            } else { //If the lastCommand timer is not greater than 864000000 Milliseconds
                    c.sendMessage("Sorry, But you must wait 24 hours before using this command again!");//Sends a message
                            }
                    }[/code]

now do not compile yet now u must go 2 player.java and search for

now go 2 end of that line u will see

[code], foodDelay, potDelay;[/codee]

now u can change 2 this

or this

now compile and restart server and u get working if u get errores or need help add me on msn tarb@live.co.uk
